about_the_game:
Moai is a puzzly tropical adventure set on the Pacific island of Rapa Nui, also known as Easter Island. You play as Jane, an up and coming anthropologist tasked with exploring a newly discovered temple that lies below the island's surface. What lies within this temple will lead you on an adventure across the entire island and will delve into the forgotten fictional history of Rapa Nui!

A Forgotten Temple
An entrance to an ancient temple that resides below the surface of Rapa Nui has been unearthed after a recent earthquake. Scientists, Historians, and Anthropologists from all over the world have descended upon the island, eager to learn more.

So Many Moai
The Moai, also known as Easter Island Heads, famously adorn Rapa Nui's surface. Each Moai has a rich history, distinct facial features, and belongs to an ancient tribe. Some of these tribes still exist, and may be able to help you identify which Moai belongs to who!


Become The Birdman
The Birdman is a sacred figure in ancient Rapa Nui culture, and to become a Birdman requires someone to complete a dangerous but exciting trek to Motu Nui, a small islet off the island's coast.

Strap On Your Helmet
Get ready to ride! Rapa Nui is covered with winding dirt roads for you to rip around on, and ramps for you to fly off of. Or take a more leisurely approach and enjoy the relaxing scenery the island has to offer.

name: Moai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Rip around Easter Island on your scooter, take lots of photos, learn from ancient writings, and discover who carved each Moai in this puzzling island adventure!
